title.rendered: Sleeping Dogs fans have a real chance to get a sequel or a remake

content.rendered:
©

Recently it became known that the Embracer Group bought the Eidos Montreal, Crystal Dynamics and Square Enix Montréal studios from Square Enix along with the rights to popular game series. Some analysts claim that the Embracer Group also got all the rights to Sleeping Dogs.

Industry figures are confident that very good news can await fans of Sleeping Dogs soon. Upon receiving all their assets, the new owners will want to revive the most remarkable projects, among which there will definitely be Sleeping Dogs.

Most likely, Embracer Group will first of all want to check to interest the audience. For this, a remaster or remake of Sleeping Dogs will be released. Only after a successful re-release of the game can we expect a full-fledged sequel.
